data.name: Video Horror Society - SUPERFAN Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
A super deal for a super fan! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and enough Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

SUPERFAN instantly unlocks exclusive Rewards:
  • First Edition Video Horror Society Club Shirt and Shorts
  • SuperFan Account Portrait
  • SuperFan Sticker for Teens
  • SuperFan Sticker for Monsters
  • 300 Fanbux

PLUS Limited Edition SUPERCUT Movies:
Play to unlock super exclusive lore, cosmetics, and Fanbux rewards!

Spectral Collectors SUPERCUT:
  • Stage 1 SUPER Spectra-Suit Costume
  • Spectral Scan Emote
  • Spectral Collector Socks
  • SuperFan Movie Tshirt, Teen Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 350 Fanbux!

Bonvini’s The Evil Never Dies SUPERCUT:
  • Malum’s Mark Lower Gear (Part 1 of 3) for all launch Monsters
  • Malum’s Mark Scream FX
  • The Devil’s Omen
  • SUPERCUT Movie Tshirt, Evil Stickers, and Account Portrait
  • PLUS 350 Fanbux!

Become a SUPERFAN today!
*Limited Edition Movies will unlock upon official game release and will never expire

data.short_description: A super deal for a super fan! Join the Video Horror Society to earn some serious fan rewards: Collectible Cosmetics, Limited Edition Movies, and enough Fanbux to drive a fan nuts. Dare to go beyond the movies. Become a Founding Fan today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 470 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K (3.5Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3GB) or AMD Radeon 7870 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Medium quality settings.
